A reagent cocktail containing 300 nM his-tagged MLXBIR3SG; 200 nM biotinylated SMAC peptide (AVPI); 5 μg/mL anti-his allophycocyanin (XL665) (CISBio International); and 200 ng/mL streptavidin-europium (Perkin Elmer) was prepared in reagent buffer (50 mM Tris [pH 7.2], 120 mM NaCl, 0.1% bovine globulins, 5mM DTT and 0.05% octylglucoside).
Samples for fluorescence polarization affinity measurements were prepared by addition of 1 :2 serial dilutions starting at a final concentration of 5μM of MLXBIR3SG in polarization buffer (50 mM Tris [pH 7.2], 120 mM NaCl, 1% bovine globulins 5mM DTT and 0.05% octylglucoside) to 5-carboxyflourescein- conjugated AVPdi-Phe-NH<sub>2</sub> (AVP-diPhe-FAM) at 5 nM final concentration.
Competition experiments were performed by addition of the MLXBIR3SG at 30 nM to wells containin
